reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 472/97: PRINCIPALS AND VICE-PRINCIPALS OF SCHOOL AUTHORITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRINCIPALS AND VICE-PRINCIPALS OF SCHOOL AUTHORITIES

content.content: 1.Each of the following provisions apply, as of the day the provision comes into force, to principals and vice-principals who are employed by a school authority both on December 31, 1997 and January 1, 1998: 1. Subsections 277.11 (2) to (5) of the Act. 2. Subsection 287.2 (2) of the Act. 3. Subsection 287.2 (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 472/97, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1.Each of the following provisions apply, as of the day the provision comes into force, to principals and vice-principals who are employed by a school authority both on December 31, 1997 and January 1, 1998:

1. Subsections 277.11 (2) to (5) of the Act.

2. Subsection 287.2 (2) of the Act.

3. Subsection 287.2 (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 472/97, s. 1.

Français
